text: Dealul Mitropoliei () is a small hill in Bucharest, Romania.. It is also called or "Patriarchate Hill". It is an important historic, cultural, architectural, religious and touristic point in the national capital. The Romanian Patriarchy and the residence of the Patriarch are here. Next to the Patriarchy there is a house (nr. 19) which is in the "National Architectural Patrimonial of Romania". Category:Geography of Bucharest Category:Hills of Europe
title: Dealul Mitropoliei
